column5: Open ranch style home in quiet, shaded neighborhood with access to the Trinity River trails. Large family room in center of home, cozy and cool even on a hot day. Brick galley kitchen with gas stove. 4 bedrooms, dining room and library [can be used for an extra sleeping area]. Large master bedroom and bathroom with 2 vanities, bath tub and shower. Crib available in bedroom with twin bed. Back patio protected on 3 sides by home with fire pit and basketball goal. 2 bikes available for guest use.
